SEARCH
Package scs1_group1.container.data

Class ReplenishmentRequestContainer

Object
RecordContainer
ReplenishmentRequestContainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Container
public class ReplenishmentRequestContainer extends RecordContainer
Container class for managing replenishment requests. Provides functionalities to load, add, retrieve, update, remove, and export replenishment requests.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReplenishmentRequestContainer(String file_path)
    Constructs a ReplenishmentRequestContainer and loads replenishment requests from the given CSV file.

      Constructs a ReplenishmentRequestContainer and loads replenishment requests from the given CSV file.

  • Method Details

    • loadReplenishmentRequests

      private void loadReplenishmentRequests(String filePath)
      Loads replenishment requests from the specified CSV file into the container.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the CSV file.

    • addReplenishmentRequest

      public void addReplenishmentRequest(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Adds a new replenishment request to the container.
      Parameters:
      medicineName - Name of the medicine.
      quantity - Quantity of the medicine requested.

    • getReplenishmentRequestById

      public ReplenishmentRequest getReplenishmentRequestById(int recordId)
      Retrieves a replenishment request by its record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the replenishment request to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The ReplenishmentRequest object if found, otherwise null.

    • updateReplenishmentRequestStatus

      public void updateReplenishmentRequestStatus(int recordId, String status)
      Updates the status of a replenishment request.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the replenishment request to update.
      status - The new status to set for the replenishment request.

    • removeReplenishmentRequest

      public void removeReplenishmentRequest(int recordId)
      Removes a replenishment request from the container by its record ID.
      Parameters:
      recordId - The ID of the replenishment request to be removed.

    • getAllReplenishmentRequests

      public List<ReplenishmentRequest> getAllReplenishmentRequests()
      Retrieves all replenishment requests in the container.
      Returns:
      A list of all ReplenishmentRequest objects in the container.

    • exportReplenishmentRequestToCSV

      public void exportReplenishmentRequestToCSV(String filePath)
      Exports all replenishment requests to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the CSV file to which the replenishment requests will be exported.
